titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale School of Drama Production Notebooks of Master of Fine Arts Students
Yale School of Drama Production Notebooks of Master of Fine Arts Students
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:36

did.unittitle: Yale School of Drama production notebooks of Master of Fine Arts students

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of production notebooks of third-year Yale School of Drama students with concentrations in stage management. The production notebooks are one of three components making up the students' theses.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 47 (YRG 47), Collections documenting teaching and learning in Yale academic programs.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Written permission of the author is required for photocopying.

Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale School of Drama Production Notebooks of Master of Fine Arts Students (RU 309). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by year of graduation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of production notebooks of third-year Yale School of Drama students with concentrations in stage management. The production notebooks are one of three components making up the students' theses.

did.unittitle: Production notebooks of Master of Fine Arts students of the Yale School of Drama
"The Death of the Last Black Man in the Whole Entire World"
